info.title: SqlManagementClient
info.description: The Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web APIs that interact with Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases, servers, and other entities.

get.description: Gets a database's long term retention policy.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 LTRNotSupportedForPerDBCMK - Long-term Backup Retention is not supported when Database-level CMK is configured in preview.

 * 400 LongTermRetentionPolicyNotSupported - Long Term Retention is not supported on this database.

 * 400 LongTermRetentionPolicyInvalid - Long Term Retention policy is invalid.

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

 * 409 ConflictingServerOperation - Server '{0}' is busy with another operation. Please try your operation later.

get.description: Gets a database's long term retention policy.

parameters.name: policyName
parameters.description: The policy name. Should always be Default.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 LTRNotSupportedForPerDBCMK - Long-term Backup Retention is not supported when Database-level CMK is configured in preview.

 * 400 LongTermRetentionPolicyNotSupported - Long Term Retention is not supported on this database.

 * 400 LongTermRetentionPolicyInvalid - Long Term Retention policy is invalid.

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

 * 409 ConflictingServerOperation - Server '{0}' is busy with another operation. Please try your operation later.

put.description: Set or update a database's long term retention policy.

parameters.name: policyName
parameters.description: The policy name. Should always be Default.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The long term retention policy info.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidResourceRequestBody - The resource or resource properties in the request body is empty or invalid.

 * 400 InvalidParameterValue - An invalid value was given to a parameter.

 * 400 LongTermRetentionMissingWeekOfYear - WeekOfYear is required to be set between 1 and 52 in order to set yearly retention.

 * 400 LTRNotSupportedForPerDBCMK - Long-term Backup Retention is not supported when Database-level CMK is configured in preview.

 * 400 LongTermRetentionPolicyNotSupported - Long Term Retention is not supported on this database.

 * 400 LongTermRetentionPolicyInvalid - Long Term Retention policy is invalid.

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

 * 404 OperationIdNotFound - The operation with Id does not exist.

 * 409 ConflictingServerOperation - Server '{0}' is busy with another operation. Please try your operation later.

 * 409 OperationCancelled - The operation has been cancelled by user.

 * 409 OperationInterrupted - The operation on the resource could not be completed because it was interrupted by another operation on the same resource.

 * 429 SubscriptionTooManyCreateUpdateRequests - Requests beyond max requests that can be processed by available resources.

 * 429 SubscriptionTooManyRequests - Requests beyond max requests that can be processed by available resources.

 * 500 OperationTimedOut - The operation timed out and automatically rolled back. Please retry the operation.

 * 503 TooManyRequests - Requests beyond max requests that can be processed by available resources.

LongTermRetentionPolicyListResult.description: A list of long term retention policies.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

LongTermRetentionPolicyProperties.description: Properties of a long term retention policy

backupStorageAccessTier.description: The BackupStorageAccessTier for the LTR backups

weeklyRetention.description: The weekly retention policy for an LTR backup in an ISO 8601 format.

monthlyRetention.description: The monthly retention policy for an LTR backup in an ISO 8601 format.

yearlyRetention.description: The yearly retention policy for an LTR backup in an ISO 8601 format.

weekOfYear.description: The week of year to take the yearly backup in an ISO 8601 format.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for the request.

BlobAuditingPolicyNameParameter.name: blobAuditingPolicyName
BlobAuditingPolicyNameParameter.description: The name of the blob auditing policy.

ManagedInstanceNameParameter.name: managedInstanceName
ManagedInstanceNameParameter.description: The name of the managed instance.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

SqlDatabaseNameParameter.name: sqlDatabaseName
SqlDatabaseNameParameter.description: The name of the sql database.

SqlPoolNameParameter.name: sqlPoolName
SqlPoolNameParameter.description: The name of the sql pool.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

VirtualClusterNameParameter.name: virtualClusterName
VirtualClusterNameParameter.description: The name of the virtual cluster.
